review: I'm in Edmonton and I have every fast food joint app available to me on my phone. The McDonald's app is by far the best, and it's not even close! I rarely have a problem, and if I do, it's usually a reboot of my phone or a small pause of the app that fixes any glitch. Sometimes I have to turn the Wi-Fi off on my phone before I even enter a McDonald's location, as it will automatically connect to theirs, and that can sometimes be down. But PLEASE, add syrup as a purchasable condiment on the app!
